GSP33yamis_pu:0: tatra kasyacid ekasya vaśe viśvaṃ pravartate |

GSP33yamis_pu:2: tatra mīmāṃsakāḥ prāhuḥ nāyaṃ sarvārthadarśanaśaktisampannaḥ puruṣo 'bhyupagamam arhati,
GSP33yamis_pu:3: atipatitasakalasādhakapramāṇasambhāvanābhūmitvāt sphuṭavividhabādhakatvāc ca / tathā hi asya pratyakṣam anyad vā sādhakaṃ bhavet ?
GSP33yamis_pu:7_1: sarva evārthās darśanaṃ śaktiś ca gocarayitavyāni / na ca vidyamānendriyasannikarṣayogyakatipayaviṣayaniyatavṛtter
GSP33yamis_pu:7_2: laukikapratyakṣasya niravadhir ayaṃ mahimā saṃbhāvanābhūmir iti katham iva tad iha
GSP33yamis_pu:11: tat khalu yogivijñānam aindriyakaṃ na vā ?
GSP33yamis_pu:14: tasya hy āśrayatvād āśrayābhāve tadasambhavāt / ato 'pekṣito 'rthasannikarṣaḥ / sahakārivirahe katham indriyāṇy atītādiviṣayasākṣātkārāya kalperan ?
GSP33yamis_pu:17_1: bahirindriyāṇi jñānajananānīti tāny api nātīte 'nāgate vārthe jñānaṃ janayantīti
GSP33yamis_pu:17_2: na tad upajanitaṃ pratyakṣaṃ yathoktaviṣayaniyamam atikrāmati /
GSP33yamis_pu:19_0: āntaragocara eva sukhādau svāntasvātantryāt / bāhyaviṣayamitiṣu ca manaso niraṅkuśakaraṇatāṅgīkāre
GSP33yamis_pu:19_1: hi kṛtaṃ cakṣurādibhiḥ / ataś ca kaścid andho badhiro vā bhavet / bhavati cātra vimatipadaṃ
GSP33yamis_pu:20: tatra tattantravṛttitvāt / yady atra yattantravṛtti na tat tannirapekṣaṃ tatra pravartate,
GSP33yamis_pu:21_0: yathālokāpekṣapravṛtti cakṣuḥ svagocare 'ndhatamasa iti / na ca siddhāuṣadhamantratapaḥsamādhimahimasamāsāditātiśayānīndriyāṇi
GSP33yamis_pu:23_0: sāmarthyasya ca pratiniyamāt / na khalu suprayuktabheṣajaśatavihitasaṃskāram api
GSP33yamis_pu:25: dṛśyamānatatprakarṣavad ity aindriyakaṃ jñānaṃ nātītādi gocarayati /
GSP33yamis_pu:26_0: bhāvanāprakarṣaparyantajanmanas tu saty api viśadanirbhāsatve prācyānubhavagocarād
GSP33yamis_pu:28: / pratyakṣasya vā sataḥ katham iva viditaviṣayaniyamavyatikramaḥ ?
GSP33yamis_pu:29: atikrāmato vā kutaḥ pratyakṣatvam iti na viśvānubhavāiśvaryaśālini pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇam /
GSP33yamis_pu:30: nāpi pramāṇāntaram / tat khalv anumānam āgamo vā ?
GSP33yamis_pu:31: anumānam api viśeṣato dṛṣṭaṃ sāmānyato dṛṣṭaṃ vā ?
GSP33yamis_pu:32_1: idam anumānam udetum alam / na hy anavagatacarahutabhujas tadavinābhāvitayā dhūmam
GSP33yamis_pu:32_2: anusandhātum īśate / na ca sarvārthanirmāṇasākṣātkārapaṭīyasi liṅgaṃ sāmānyato dṛṣṭam
GSP33yamis_pu:36: kāryatvād eva jagatas tatkartur anumīyatām || YIs_5 ||
GSP33yamis_pu:37_1: ghaṭamaṇikagṛhādi / kāryaṃ ca vimatipadam avanigirimahārṇavādīti tad api tathāvidhabuddhimaddhetukam
GSP33yamis_pu:37_2: adhyavasīyate / na ca kāryatvam asiddham iti vācyam,
GSP33yamis_pu:38_0: avayavasanniveśādibhir hetubhis tatsiddheḥ / iha cānyāvayavibhyaḥ prabhṛti ādvyaṇukam
GSP33yamis_pu:38_2: upādānaṃ caturvidhāḥ paramāṇavaḥ prapañcasya / teṣām ādiparispandasya tadanuguṇādṛṣṭaviśiṣṭatattatkṣetrajñasaṃyogāsamavāyikāraṇaka
GSP33yamis_pu:38_3: iti upakaraṇam api samastakṣetrajñavartini dharmādharmalakṣaṇāny adṛṣṭāni / prayojanaṃ
GSP33yamis_pu:38_5: eva kṣetrajñāḥ sampradānam / na cāmī svasamavāyināv api dharmādharmāvalam avalokayitum
GSP33yamis_pu:38_7: puruṣadhaureyakaḥ kim iti na sāmānyatodṛṣṭaliṅgād anumīyate ?
GSP33yamis_pu:39: tad idam aviditānumānavṛttasya svamatiracitataralatarkollasitam iti parihasanti mīmāṃsakāḥ / tathā hi kim idam ekacetanādhīnatvaṃ nāmābhipretaṃ tanubhuvanādeḥ ?
GSP33yamis_pu:41: kim asya tasminn āyattaṃ kiṃ nu janmātha vā sthitiḥ |
GSP33yamis_pu:42: pravṛttir vādyayos tāvat sādhyahīnaṃ nidarśanam || YIs_6 ||
GSP33yamis_pu:43: na khalu śarīram ekacetanādhīnotpattisthiti / ye hi yaddehādhīnasukhaduḥkhopabhogabhāginaḥ,
GSP33yamis_pu:44_0: bhavati hi taducitādṛṣṭaśālināṃ sarveṣām eva teṣāṃ taddehina iva tadutpattisthitinimittatvam /
GSP33yamis_pu:44_1: api ca śarīrāvayavinaḥ svāvayavasamavāyalakṣaṇā sthitir avayavyatiṣaṅgaviśeṣād ṛte
GSP33yamis_pu:44_2: na cetayitāraṃ param apekṣate / yā punas tadapekṣiṇī prāṇanalakṣaṇā sthitiḥ,
GSP33yamis_pu:45_0: na sā pakṣīkṛte kṣityādau sambhavatīti sthitim api naikarūpāṃ pakṣasapakṣānuyāyinīm
GSP33yamis_pu:45_2: upalatarurathādibhir vyabhicāraḥ / ārabdhatvād eva caitatsādhyasiddhābadhikam idam
GSP33yamis_pu:47: cetanair bhoktṛbhir bhogyaḥ karmabhir janyate hi naḥ || YIs_7 ||
GSP33yamis_pu:48: yuktaṃ caitat yadubhayavādisiddhānām eva cetanānāṃ kartṛtvābhyupagamaḥ;
GSP33yamis_pu:51: sākṣātkartuṃ kṣamante yat sarva eva ca cetanāḥ || YIs_8 ||
GSP33yamis_pu:52: adyavad eva viśvambharādayaḥ kramaprāptāgantukopacayāpacayaikadeśaśālino na yugapad eva niravaśeṣavilayajananabhāgina ityantimaparamāṇusākṣātkāro na kartṛbhāvopayogī /
GSP33yamis_pu:54: mā bhūt pratyakṣatā tasya śaktimad dhy akṣagocaraḥ || YIs_9 ||
GSP33yamis_pu:55_1: sākṣātkṛtya tat tad ārabhante / yadi paraṃ śaktim aviduṣām abhilaṣitasādhane tadupādānādivyavahāro 'nupapannaḥ, iha tu
GSP33yamis_pu:57: tena karmabhir ātmānaḥ sarvaṃ nirmimatāṃ pṛthak || YIs_10 ||
GSP33yamis_pu:58: api ca tad eva cetanakarṭrkaṃ jagati paridṛśyate,
GSP33yamis_pu:59: yad eva śakyakriyaṃ śakyajñānopādānādi ca / na ca tathā mahīmahīśvaramahārṇavādīti katham iva tattatkāryatvam ?

GSP33yamis_pu:63_2: syāt / na caivaṃ sati sarvānumānavyavahārocchedaprasaṅgaḥ śaṅkitavyaḥ / pramāṇāntaragocare
GSP33yamis_pu:63_3: hi liṅgini liṅgabalād āpatato viparītaviśeṣāṃs tatpramāṇam eva pratiruṇaddhi / iha
GSP33yamis_pu:71: na copādānādisākṣātkāriṇi eva kartṛtvam ity api niyamaḥ;
GSP33yamis_pu:72: upādānam upakaraṇaṃ cāviduṣa evātmano jñānādiṣu kartṛtvāt /
GSP33yamis_pu:76: prayogaś ca bhavati mahīmahīdharādi kāryaṃ na bhavati,
GSP33yamis_pu:79: vyatirekeṇa ghaṭādivat / paramāṇavo na pratyakṣāḥ niratiśayasūkṣmadravyatvāt,
GSP33yamis_pu:80: tathaiva ghaṭādivat / vimativiṣayaḥ kāle na lokaśūnyaḥ,
GSP33yamis_pu:81: kālatvād idānīntanakālavat / tanubhuvanādīśvarakartṛkaṃ na bhavati kāryatvāt tadvad eva / īśvaraḥ kartā na bhavati prayojanarahitatvād aśarīratvād vā muktātmavad iti /
GSP33yamis_pu:82: atra brūmo na kāryatvaṃ kṣityādau śakyanihnavam |
GSP33yamis_pu:87: netara ity avayavasanniveśaviśeṣapratiniyataṃ rūpabhedam udīkṣāmahe / yat tu śakyakriyaṃ śakyajñānopādānopakaraṇaṃ ca kriyata iti,
GSP33yamis_pu:88_0: tad astu nāma / kin tu te kriyājñānaśaktī kriyājñānābhyām eva samadhigamanīye / te
GSP33yamis_pu:88_1: ca kṣityādiṣu yathoktasādhanabalasamupasthāpite iti na viśeṣaḥ prasiddhaprākāragopurādikāryebhyas
GSP33yamis_pu:88_2: tanubhuvanādeḥ / na caitāvān eva kriyāgocara iti viṣayaniyamaḥ kaścit kriyāyā dṛṣṭaḥ;
GSP33yamis_pu:89: yenedam aśakyakriyam adhyavasyema / siddhe ca kāryatve tadupādānādisakṣātkaraṇatadadhiṣṭhānatatpreraṇanipuṇaḥ puruṣaviśeṣaḥ sidhyaty eva /
GSP33yamis_pu:91: kṣetrajñeneva svaśarīrādau / sa ca dravyaiḥ saṃyogalakṣaṇaḥ,
GSP33yamis_pu:92: tadguṇais tu saṃyuktasamavāyarūpaḥ / pravṛttiś ca paramāṇūnāṃ parispandalakṣaṇā;
GSP33yamis_pu:93: dharmādharmayos tu phalodayānukūlatādṛśadeśakālādisahakārisahitatā / tābhyāṃ dharmādharmābhyām eva phalam,
GSP33yamis_pu:94_0: cetanānadhiṣṭhitānāṃ sarveṣām eteṣām acaitanyenākiñcitkaratvāt / na hi cetanena vardhakinānadhiṣṭhitā
GSP33yamis_pu:94_1: vāsī deśakālādisahakāriśatasamadhigame 'pi yūpādīny upādayitum alam / bījāṅkurādayas
GSP33yamis_pu:94_2: tu pakṣāntarbhūtā iti tair vyabhicāravacanam anabhijñatayaiva śrotriyāṇām / etena
GSP33yamis_pu:94_3: sukhādibhir vyabhicāro 'pi pratyuktaḥ / na cobhayavādisiddhatāmātreṇa kṣetrajñānām

GSP33yamis_pu:96: na dṛṣṭavirodhinī / na caivam īśvarasyāśaktir niścitā;
GSP33yamis_pu:97: pramāṇāntaratas tatsiddheḥ / yathoditapramāṇabalena sidhyan sāṃsiddhikasarvārthadarśanatatpreraṇaśaktisampanna eva sidhyati;
GSP33yamis_pu:101: aprayojakatvāt teṣām / na hi kiñcit kriyamāṇaṃ kartur arthāntaraviṣayam asāmarthyam ajñānaṃ vā svotpattaye 'pekṣate;
GSP33yamis_pu:102_2: api ca kiṃ taditarasamastavastuviṣayam ajñānādi vyāpakam,
GSP33yamis_pu:103: uta katipayagocaram iti vivecanīyam / na tāvad aśeṣaviṣayam,
GSP33yamis_pu:104: anupalabdheḥ / na khalu kumbhakāraḥ kumbhātireki kim api na vijānāti / atha katipayaviṣayam ?
GSP33yamis_pu:106: aniyataviṣayatayā tasya tasya vyabhicāradarśanāt / na cāsti kiñcidvyavasthitam,
GSP33yamis_pu:109: śarīragrahaṇenaivānaikāntyāt / na khalu śarīraviśiṣṭas sann evāyam ātmā śarīram upādatte,
GSP33yamis_pu:110: ayogino yugapadanekaśarīragrahaṇāyogāt / pūrvadehaparityāgena dehāntaraprāpakakarmapreritaprāṇasahāya eva dehāntaraṃ praviśatīty upapāditam ātmacintāyām /
GSP33yamis_pu:113: yugapad ekakriyāyām ekasya karmakartṛtvavirodhāt / adhitiṣṭhāsitadehasaṃyogavata eva tatpravṛttyanuguṇaprayatnayogalakṣaṇam adhiṣṭhānaṃ dṛṣṭam iti cet;
GSP33yamis_pu:116_0: na yato 'nyad apy adhiṣṭhīyamānaṃ mānadaṇḍādi svasambandhinaivādhiṣṭhīyate / tenādhiṣṭhānakriyāpekṣitādhiṣṭheyapadārthasambandhamātrātirekeṇa
GSP33yamis_pu:116_1: dehasambandho nāmāparo nādartavyaḥ / asti ceśvarasyāpi jagadupādānopakaraṇais sambandha ity uktam eva /
GSP33yamis_pu:117: atha svadehavyatirikte vastuni pravṛttiviśeṣakaratvaṃ dehadvāreṇaiva / dṛṣṭaṃ hi daṇḍacakrādiṣu karasaṃyogādinā kulālādeḥ pravartayitṛtvam ity ucyeta;
GSP33yamis_pu:120: isāraṇadarśanāt / katham asati śarīre parapreraṇātmakaḥ saṅkalpa iti cet; kiṃ śarīraṃ saṅkalpayati,
GSP33yamis_pu:122: / karaṇam iti cen na; manasaḥ karaṇatvāt / kim asatīśvarasya manaḥ ?
GSP33yamis_pu:123: bāḍham / nanv evaṃ vigrahadharmādharmānāśvaryādayaḥ sādhāraṇadharmāḥ prāduḥṣyuḥ / maivam;
GSP33yamis_pu:125: draḍhimnaivāpāsatvāt / manaso nityendriyatayā dehāpagame 'pi sambandhābhyupagamād anaikāntikaś ca / yāvad dhi dṛṣṭānuguṇaṃ vyāptayupayogi,
GSP33yamis_pu:126_0: tāvad anujñāyate / na cāsmadāder manasāpy acintyaracanasyāparyantavistārasya mahābhūtabhautikaprapañcasya
GSP33yamis_pu:126_1: prādeśikaśarīrakaḥ kiñcijjñaḥ puṇyapāpaparavaśagatir alaṃ nirmāṇāyety aparimitajñānāiśvaryaśaktiḥ
GSP33yamis_pu:126_2: śarīrādyanapekṣaḥ saṅkalpād eva sakalabhuvananirmāṇakṣamaḥ kartā siddhaḥ /

GSP33yamis_pu:128: atigahanagiritaṭādhiṣṭhānenātiprakṛṣṭādṛṣṭacarendhananivahasambandhinā hutavahaviśeṣeṇa mahānasādau dhūmasya vā kiṃ sambandho dṛṣṭaḥ ?
GSP33yamis_pu:129_0: yena dhūmaviśeṣadarśanād giriśikhare tathāvidhāgnir anumīyate / yādṛśo dhūmo yatrāvagataḥ
GSP33yamis_pu:129_1: tatraiva tādṛśas tatsampādanasamartho dṛṣtāntabhūmāv aparidṛṣṭo 'pi sāmānyavyāptibalena
GSP33yamis_pu:130_0: tad idam asmābhir abhidhīyamānaṃ kim iti na hṛdayam adhirohati bhavatām / ihāpi kāryatvaṃ
GSP33yamis_pu:130_2: svasampādanasamartham adṛṣṭapūrvam eva buddhimatkartāram upasthāpayati / yathaiva
GSP33yamis_pu:131_1: kāryasya svanirmāṇasamarthabuddhimatkartṛmātreṇa sambandhaniyamaniścaya iti na kaścidviśeṣaḥ /
GSP33yamis_pu:132: api ca vibhudravyasaṃyoginaḥ parispandavataś ca sarvatra sparśavattvāvyabhicāre 'pi jñānasukhādinityadravyaviśeṣaguṇānumitātmasaṃyogino manasaḥ katham iva sparśarahitatatvam ?
GSP33yamis_pu:133: kathaṃ ca vāyavīyadravyasya mahimaguṇaśālino niyatādhiṣṭhānasparśanatvaniyamadarśane 'pi tvagindriye tadviparyayaḥ ?
GSP33yamis_pu:134: taijasasya vā rūpasparśayor anyattarasya vā prākaṭyaniyame 'pi rūpopalambhasādhanatānumitataijasabhāvasya cakṣuṣo niyamena tadubhayānudbhavābhyupagamaḥ ?
GSP33yamis_pu:135: / atha kāryadarśanānumitasadbhāvānāṃ taijasādibhāve 'pi tattadviśeṣaṇāṃ yogyānupalabdhibādhitatvāt tadabhyupagame 'nekaniyamabhaṅgaprasaṅgāc ca tathābhyupagamaḥ,
GSP33yamis_pu:136: hanta tarhi prakṛtaviṣaye 'pi prasañjitadharmaviśeṣāṇām anupalambhabādhāviśeṣād anekaniyamadarśanavighātaprasaṅgāc ca tathābhyupagama iti sarvaṃ samānam anyatrābhiniveśāt /
GSP33yamis_pu:137: dṛśyante hi nītayaḥ / yathā vivādāspadaṃ paramāṇvādi prekṣāvatpreritaṃ ceṣṭate,
GSP33yamis_pu:139: yathā tathāvidhaṃ kandukādi / tathā vivādādhyāsitā bāhyābhyantarapravṛttayaḥ prakṛtyupakaraṇapratyakṣapūrvikāḥ kāryatvāt tadvad eva |
